article.Heading: GST will strengthen India’s long-term story: ITC
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Priya Sheth, ITC’s Sanjeev Puri shared his readings and views on goods and services tax (GST).
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Priya Sheth, ITC’s Sanjeev Puri shared his readings and views on goods and services tax (GST).

GST is a transformational reform, it is going to strengthen India’s long-term story, it augurs well for the medium and the long-term and a reform of this magnitude is bound to have some transitional change. I believe that the amount of pain that we have faced in GST transition is much lesser than anticipated, he said.
